channel.title: I think someone is useing cheat client on my server
channel.description: Hi, SOmeone keeps logging onto my server spawning a million phats and then dropping them I think he is useing a cheat client. Can anyone tell me how to make cheat clients not work with my server? I think its called UID protection but im not sure..

item.title: I think someone is useing cheat client on my server
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

All it takes is a search,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You should also make a system (Well a method) in your ‘process()’ which can check the amount off a certain items one has, this can be useful. I’m not going to do it for you but it’s just a suggestion.

Read full topic
item.source: I think someone is useing cheat client on my server
